AUTHOR: El Laggron, modified by kportalz
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for downloading this cog. Type `[p]help BetterMod` to get a preview of the available commands. If you have any bug, question of suggestion, join my cog support server! https://discord.gg/WsTGeQM
NAME: bettermod
SHORT: Allow moderators to add warnings to users. Can kick and ban, better mod log and case storage!
DESCRIPTION: This cog allows you to add warnings on users with 3 different levels: simple, kick and ban. The user get a DM when you give him a warning, with the reason. It also post it in a modlog channel with embeds, and store the warnings into the files, so you can check all of them and see the total, edit and remove some...
